headline: Comcast’s Network Traffic Increased More Than 75% While Energy Efficiency Nearly Doubled Over Past Five Years
summary: PHILADELPHIA, July 07, 2025--Comcast today announced that it is on the cusp of reaching the company’s goal to double its network energy efficiency, well ahead of its 2030 target.
